accounts.name: sender_gate_token_account
docs: Optional: sender's token account for the asset gate mint (if required)

errors.name: BidTooLow
errors.msg: Bid amount must be higher than current highest bid

errors.name: BidIncrementTooSmall
errors.msg: Bid increment too small - must be at least 5% higher

errors.name: NoBidsPlaced
errors.msg: No bids were placed on this auction

errors.name: AuctionHasBids
errors.msg: Cannot cancel auction with existing bids

errors.name: EscrowNotPending
errors.msg: Escrow is not in pending status

errors.name: InsufficientAssetBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient token balance for asset gate

errors.name: InsufficientDmDeposit
errors.msg: DM deposit amount is below recipient's required price
